description.en: Design and its different types, how do products differ from services in the context of design. Visualizing service processes (customer journey, service plan). Phases of the service design process. The concept of service design, principles and techniques of design thinking. Service design models, tools/methods to use. Identifying customer needs and combining a design brief. Generation and development of ideas. Creativity, innovation and learning from mistakes during the service design process.
description.et: Disain ja selle liigid, toode/teenus sarnasused/erinevused disaini kontekstis. Teenuste pakkumise protsessi visualiseerimine (klienditeekond, teenindusplaan). Disaini ja teenusearenduse protsessi etapid. Teenusedisaini mõiste, disainmõtlemise printsiibid ja tehnikad. Teenuste disaini mudelid ja seonduvad meetodid/tehnikad. Kliendivajaduste identifitseerimine ja lähteülesande koostamine teenusedisainiks. Lähteülesandest lähtuvalt ideede genereerimine ja arendamine. Loovus, innovatsioon ja vigadest õppimine teenuste disainimise protsessis.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to enable students to see connections between design thinking, design management and service design, give knowledge regarding the service design process and related methods. The course will also provide an overview of customer-oriented design and give an opportunity to use design methods on real cases.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on, et tudeng teaks disainmõtlemise, disainijuhtimise ja teenuste disaini seoseid ning teenuste disainimise protsessi etappe ning oskaks kasutada seonduvaid meetodeid.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows the essence of design thinking and differences between deductive and inductive thinking;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab disainmõtlemise olemust ja erinevust induktiivsest ja deduktiivsest mõtlemisest;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) knows service design process models and related methods; service visualisation methods (customer journey, service blueprint);
learning_outcomes.et: 2) teab teenuste disaini protsessi kirjeldavaid mudeleid ning teenusedisaini protsessi etappides rakendatavaid meetodeid, sh teenuste pakkumise protsessi visualiseerimise põhimeetodeid (klienditeekond ja teenindusplaan jmt);
3) teab kasutajakeskse disaini põhimõtteid ja protsessi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is able to put together a service development brief, draw and explain the customer journey and service blueprint;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab koostada olemasoleva teenuse klienditeekonna ja teenindusplaani;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) is able to research service users and stakeholders, analyse service processes;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) oskab teostada olemasoleva teenuse kasutajauuringut ja analüüsida teenuseprotsesse;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) is able to (re)design simple service according to the design brief and analysis.
learning_outcomes.et: 6) oskab disainida lähtuvalt analüüsist uusi lihtsamaid teenuseid või parendada olemasoleva teenuse disaini.

independent_work.et: All needed information can be found from the Moodle course.
